properties.name: sftp.supplier.tmpFileSuffix
properties.description: The suffix to use while the transfer is in progress.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.deleteRemoteFiles
properties.description: Set to true to delete remote files after successful transfer.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.renameRemoteFilesTo
properties.description: A SpEL expression resolving to the new name remote files must be renamed to after successful transfer.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.localDir
properties.description: The local directory to use for file transfers.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.autoCreateLocalDir
properties.description: Set to true to create the local directory if it does not exist.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.filenamePattern
properties.description: A filter pattern to match the names of files to transfer.

properties.name: sftp.supplier.stream
properties.description: Set to true to stream the file rather than copy to a local directory..

properties.name: sftp.factory.host
properties.description: The host name of the server.

properties.name: sftp.factory.username
properties.description: The username to use to connect to the server.

properties.name: sftp.factory.password
properties.description: The password to use to connect to the server.

properties.name: sftp.factory.port
properties.description: The password to use to connect to the server.

properties.name: sftp.factory.allowUnknownKeys
properties.description: The password to use to connect to the server.
